text: Direction des services postaux de l'Office National des Postes et de l'Épargne (ONPE) is the government organization responsible for the postal service in the Central African Republic. ==See also== *Communications in Central African Republic Central Category:Postal system of the Central African Republic Category:Government of the Central African Republic
title: Direction des services postaux de l'Office National des Postes et de l'Épargne
